Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma scored 47 runs in 29 balls with a strike rate of 162.06
Shubman Gill scored 80 runs in 66 balls with a strike rate of 121.21
Virat Kohli scored 117 runs in 113 balls with a strike rate of 103.53
Shreyas Iyer scored 105 runs in 70 balls with a strike rate of 150.00
KL Rahul scored 39 runs in 20 balls with a strike rate of 195.00
Mohammed Shami took 7 wickets for 57 runs
Trent Boult conceded 86 runs in 10 overs
Tim Southee conceded 100 runs in 10 overs
Mohammed Shami was the player of the match
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya expressed pride in the team's resilience after a close win
Rohit Sharma remarked that winning the series was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 20 overs per side
